mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply ( rno, bno, replytext, replyer ) values ( reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select rno, bno, replytext, replyer, m.username, r.regdate, r.updatedate from tbl_reply r, tbl_member m where r.replyer=m.userid and bno=#{bno} order by rno
